Class EncodeDecodeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jesusnut.utils.EncodeDecodeUtils
  • public final class EncodeDecodeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility Class for encryption and decryption of Strings(Passwords), byte[] to Base64 conversion, String to Byte[] conversion etc.
